00048 void _I2C_EEPROM_AckPolling(void);

00051 /** @defgroup I2C_EEPROM_Exported_Functions I2C EEPROM exported functions
00052   * @{
00053   */
00054 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00055   * @brief  Initializes peripherals used by the I2C EEPROM driver.
00056   * @retval None
00057   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00058 void I2C_EEPROM_Init(void)
00059 {
00060   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00061      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00062      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00063   */
00064   I2C_InitTypeDef I2C_InitStructure;
00065 
00066   /* Enable AFIO & I2C clock                                                                                */
00067   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00068   EEPROM_I2C_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00069   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO        = 1;
00070   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00071 
00072   /* Configure I2C SCL pin, I2C SDA pin                                                                     */
00073   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(EEPROM_I2C_SCL_GPIO_ID, EEPROM_I2C_SCL_AFIO_PIN, EEPROM_I2C_SCL_AFIO_MODE);
00074   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(EEPROM_I2C_SDA_GPIO_ID, EEPROM_I2C_SDA_AFIO_PIN, EEPROM_I2C_SDA_AFIO_MODE);
00075 
00076   /* I2C configuration                                                                                      */
00077   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = I2C_GENERALCALL_DISABLE;
00078   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00079   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = I2C_ACK_DISABLE;
00080   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = 0x00;
00081   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = I2C_EEPROM_SPEED;
00082   I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00083   I2C_Init(EEPROM_I2C, &I2C_InitStructure);
00084 
00085   I2C_Cmd(EEPROM_I2C, ENABLE);
00086 }
00087 
00088 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00089   * @brief  EEPROM page write.
00090   * @param  pBuffer : a pointer pointing to data source buffer.
00091   * @param  WriteAddr : destination EEPROM address.
00092   * @param  NumByteToWrite : numbers of byte.
00093   * @retval None
00094   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00095 void I2C_EEPROM_PageWrite(u8* pBuffer, u8 WriteAddr, u16 NumByteToWrite)
00096 {
00097   /* check parameters                                                                                       */
00098   Assert_Param((NumByteToWrite > 0) && ((NumByteToWrite <= (I2C_EEPROM_PAGE_SIZE - (WriteAddr & I2C_EEPROM_PAGE_MASK)))));
00099 
00100   /* acknowledge polling                                                                                    */
00101   _I2C_EEPROM_AckPolling();
00102 
00103   /* set EEPROM address                                                                                     */
00104   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY));
00105   I2C_SendData(EEPROM_I2C, WriteAddr);
00106 
00107   /* page write                                                                                             */
00108   while (NumByteToWrite--)
00109   {
00110     while (!I2C_CheckStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY));
00111     I2C_SendData(EEPROM_I2C, *pBuffer);
00112     pBuffer++;
00113   }
00114 
00115   /* end of write                                                                                           */
00116   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY));
00117   I2C_GenerateSTOP(EEPROM_I2C);
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00121   * @brief  Write numbers of sequential data to EEPROM.
00122   * @param  pBuffer : a pointer pointing to data source buffer.
00123   * @param  WriteAddr : destination EEPROM address.
00124   * @param  NumByteToWrite : numbers of byte.
00125   * @retval None
00126   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00127 void I2C_EEPROM_BufferWrite(u8* pBuffer, u8 WriteAddr, u16 NumByteToWrite)
00128 {
00129   u16 Byte2Wr, AvailableByte;
00130 
00131   /* check parameters                                                                                       */
00132   Assert_Param(NumByteToWrite <= I2C_EEPROM_CAPACITY);
00133 
00134   /* sequential write                                                                                       */
00135   while (NumByteToWrite)
00136   {
00137     AvailableByte = I2C_EEPROM_PAGE_SIZE - (WriteAddr & I2C_EEPROM_PAGE_MASK);
00138     Byte2Wr = (NumByteToWrite > AvailableByte)?(AvailableByte):(NumByteToWrite);
00139     I2C_EEPROM_PageWrite(pBuffer, WriteAddr, Byte2Wr);
00140     pBuffer += Byte2Wr;
00141     WriteAddr = (WriteAddr + Byte2Wr) & I2C_EEPROM_ADDR_MASK;
00142     NumByteToWrite -= Byte2Wr;
00143   }
00144 }
00145 
00146 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00147   * @brief  Read numbers of sequential data from EEPROM.
00148   * @param  pBuffer : a pointer pointing to data destination buffer.
00149   * @param  ReadAddr : source EEPROM address.
00150   * @param  NumByteToRead : numbers of byte.
00151   * @retval None
00152   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00153 void I2C_EEPROM_BufferRead(u8* pBuffer, u8 ReadAddr, u16 NumByteToRead)
00154 {
00155   /* check parameters                                                                                       */
00156   Assert_Param(NumByteToRead > 0);
00157 
00158   /* acknowledge polling                                                                                    */
00159   _I2C_EEPROM_AckPolling();
00160 
00161   /* set EEPROM address                                                                                     */
00162   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY));
00163   I2C_SendData(EEPROM_I2C, ReadAddr);
00164 
00165   /* send read command                                                                                      */
00166   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_EEPROM_DEV_ADDR, I2C_MASTER_READ);
00167   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_MASTER_SEND_START));
00168   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_MASTER_RECEIVER_MODE));
00169 
00170   /* enable master receiver ACK                                                                             */
00171   if (NumByteToRead > 1)
00172   {
00173     I2C_AckCmd(EEPROM_I2C, ENABLE);
00174   }
00175 
00176   /* sequential read                                                                                        */
00177   while (NumByteToRead)
00178   {
00179     while (!I2C_CheckStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY));
00180     *pBuffer = I2C_ReceiveData(EEPROM_I2C);
00181 
00182     pBuffer++;
00183     NumByteToRead--;
00184 
00185     if (NumByteToRead == 1)
00186     {
00187       I2C_AckCmd(EEPROM_I2C, DISABLE);
00188     }
00189   }
00190 
00191   /* end of read                                                                                            */
00192   I2C_GenerateSTOP(EEPROM_I2C);
00193 }
00194 /**
00195   * @}
00196   */
00197 
00198 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00199 /** @defgroup I2C_EEPROM_Private_Functions I2C EEPROM private functions
00200   * @{
00201   */
00202 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00203   * @brief  EEPROM acknowledge polling.
00204   * @retval None
00205   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00206 void _I2C_EEPROM_AckPolling(void)
00207 {
00208   u32 reg;
00209 
00210   /* wait if bus busy                                                                                       */
00211   while (I2C_GetFlagStatus(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_FLAG_BUSBUSY));
00212 
00213   while (1)
00214   {
00215     /* send slave address                                                                                   */
00216     I2C_TargetAddressConfig(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_EEPROM_DEV_ADDR, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00217 
00218     /* check status                                                                                         */
00219     while (1)
00220     {
00221       reg = EEPROM_I2C->SR;
00222 
00223       if (reg & I2C_FLAG_ADRS)
00224       {
00225         return;
00226       }
00227 
00228       if (reg & I2C_FLAG_RXNACK)
00229       {
00230         I2C_ClearFlag(EEPROM_I2C, I2C_FLAG_RXNACK);
00231         break;
00232       }
00233     }
00234   }
00235 }
